short_summary: Re-issue of bid solicitation with a new closing date
description: This bid solicitation is a re-issue of bid solicitation number W6369-23-DE24 dated 16 December 2022 with a closing of 06 January 2023 at 14:00.

full_summary:
=====================================

**Notice Title (English)**: NPP - TSPS P.Eng Re-Issue

**Notice Title (French)**: APM - SPTS Ing P Revisé

**Notice Reference Number**: PW-23-01021358

**Publication Date**: 2023-01-13

**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-30 13:00:00

*The Bid Sollication has Expired*

**Trade Agreements**: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement are all applicable to this solicitation.

**Procurement Category**: Service, SRV

**Request for Proposal**: The Department of National Defence requires a Professional Engineer (P. Eng) with experience in designing, developing, and improving security systems for various projects. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing security systems for multiple projects supported by the Department of National Defence.

**Contracting Entity**: The contract will be issued by the Department of National Defence, located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada.

**Point of Contact**: Juan Saenz-londono
Canada
Phone: None
Email: [juan.saenz@forces.gc.ca](mailto:juan.saenz@forces.gc.ca)
 
**Tender Description**: The Department of National Defence requires a senior 5.4 Professional Engineer (P. Eng) to assist in the design and implementation of security systems for various projects. The successful candidate must have experience in designing, developing, and implementing security systems.

**Attachments**: The attachment file can be found [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/13/ecd2ab5ff77319b642042e16299dcb89/23de24-b_-_task-based_npp_template_e.pdf) (English) or [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/13/e68309c86596917da875a8b25585b158/23de24-b_-_task-based_n
